instructions: Moisten here to seal before mailing. Take a moment to tell us about your smoking preferences. Please take a moment to fill out the postage-paid survey below and drop it in the mail today. Your answers will help us to better understand the preferences of today's smokers. And you could be eligible for future offers of special interest to smokers. By responding to this survey and signing below certify that I am a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older.

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes-that is, the brand you smoke most often?
Do you usually buy it by the..?
How long have you smoked this brand?
What, if any, was your previous brand?
The next time you go to the store, if your regular brand were not available, what would you do?
options: Go to another store to buy my regular brand
Buy another type or length of my regular brand
Wait until the store has my regular brand

questions.question: Which of the following statements best describes the way you use cigarette coupons?
options: I use almost any cigarette coupon I get
I occasionally use coupons for cigarettes, even if they are not for my regular brand
I only use coupons if they are for my regular brand
I never use coupons to buy cigarettes

questions.question: How often do you use special in-store cigarette offers, such as a free gift with purchase, a 2-for-1, or special prices?
Which of the following best describes you?
Is there another smoker in your household 21 years of age or older? Please print full name, birthdate and regular brand.
Would you be interested in receiving information about issues that affect smokers?
Would you be interested in joining a smokers group?
